election_record.label: Massachusetts 1819 Lieutenant Governor

overview.note: There was considerable controversy over whether those citizens living on plantations in what is now the state of Maine should be allowed to vote in state elections. They did not pay taxes and many thought they should thus not be allowed to vote. Beginning in 1814, in many of the plantations, the votes were cast and counted and included separately in the Original Election Returns, with their totals not included among the aggregate state totals.

sub_unit.name: Eastham
sub_unit.note: "Rejected, it appearing by the return that the town meeting was held and qualified to vote for representatives." Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Truro
sub_unit.note: The Truro Town Records. 225, list 22 votes for Benjamin Austin in Truro.

sub_unit.name: Yarmouth
sub_unit.note: "No certificate of Town Clerk." Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Southfield
sub_unit.note: "No return." Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Fairhaven
sub_unit.note: "Signed by only one Selectman." Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Edgartown
sub_unit.note: "No certificate of the Town Clerk." Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Hawley
sub_unit.note: Benjamin W. Crowninshield received 1 vote as B. W. Crowninshield.

sub_unit.name: Rowe
sub_unit.note: "No return." Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Russell
sub_unit.note: "Signed by one Selectman only." Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Eden
sub_unit.note: "Rejected as apparant meeting called only for Representative." Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Ellsworth
sub_unit.note: "No cert. from Town Clerk." Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Islesborough
sub_unit.note: "No certificate of Town Clerk." Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Lincoln Plantation
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Lincoln.

sub_unit.name: Monroe
sub_unit.note: "No return." Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Mount Desert
sub_unit.note: "No return." Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Thorwick
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Thorwick.

sub_unit.name: 25 Mile Pond
sub_unit.note: 25 Mile Pond was a plantation whose votes were counted and listed in the Original Election Returns but which were not included in the aggregate state totals.

sub_unit.name: Waterville
sub_unit.note: "No return." Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Wayne
sub_unit.note: "No return." Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Appleton Plantation
sub_unit.note: Appleton Plantation was a plantation whose votes were counted and listed in the Original Election Returns but which were not included in the aggregate state totals.

sub_unit.name: Montville
sub_unit.note: Montville was a plantation whose votes were counted and listed in the Original Election Returns but which were not included in the aggregate state totals.

sub_unit.name: Saint George
sub_unit.note: "Meeting held in 1818." Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Sudbury
sub_unit.note: "Not appearing any declaration nor counting." Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Waltham
sub_unit.note: "Rejected - Returned too late." Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Hiram
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded for Lieutenant Governor in Hiram though there were votes recorded for Governor.

sub_unit.name: Howards Gore
sub_unit.note: Howards Gore was a plantation whose votes were counted and listed in the Original Election Returns but which were not included in the aggregate state totals.

sub_unit.name: Mexico
sub_unit.note: Benjamin Austin received 11 votes as Benjamin A. Austin.

sub_unit.name: Waterford
sub_unit.note: "No public declaration of notice in Town Meeting." Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Carmel
sub_unit.note: "No declaration made in Open Town meeting." Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Garland
sub_unit.note: "It appearing the date of the meeting was 1812." Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Hermon
sub_unit.note: "No return." Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Newburg
sub_unit.note: "No certificate of Town Clerk." Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Orono
sub_unit.note: William Phillips received 13 votes as Honorable William.

sub_unit.name: Sangerville
sub_unit.note: "No return." Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: No. 3 3rd Range
sub_unit.note: No. 3 3rd Range was a plantation whose votes were counted and listed in the Original Election Returns but which were not included in the aggregate state totals.

sub_unit.name: No. 3 8th Range
sub_unit.note: No. 3 8th Range was a plantation whose votes were counted and listed in the Original Election Returns but which were not included in the aggregate state totals.

sub_unit.name: Kingfield
sub_unit.note: "Rejected, not being signed by Town Clerk." Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: New Vineyard
sub_unit.note: "Received too late, May 14th." Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Ripley
sub_unit.note: "Received too late, 11th May." Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Calais
sub_unit.note: The votes from Calais were rejected because of "no certificate of Town Clerk." Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Cherryfield
sub_unit.note: The votes from Cherryfield were rejected because "Returned May 12". Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Brookfield
sub_unit.note: The votes from Brookfield were rejected because "the year not mentioned." Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Gardner
sub_unit.note: Benjamin W. Crowninshield received 1 vote as Benjamin Crowninshield.

sub_unit.name: North Brookfield
sub_unit.note: "It not appearing the meeting consisted of Qualified town." Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Southbridge
sub_unit.note: Benjamin W. Crowninshield received 1 vote as Benjamin Crowninshield.

sub_unit.name: Alfred
sub_unit.note: "It not appearing that declaration was made." Original Election Returns.
